title: Door
description: A door object, as found in ROOMS[*].SCREENS[*].DOORS[*]

id.description: The Room-unique Id of this door.

type.description: An enum specifying the color/type of this door - blue, missile, boss, combat, etc.

pos.description: Which edge of its screen this door is affixed to

x.description: The number of pixels from the left of the Screen to the center of the shootable bubble part of this Door

y.description: The number of pixels from the top of the Screen to the center of the shootable bubble part of this Door.

dest_id.description: The Room-unique Id of the Door at the other end of this connection.

dest_rm.description: The Room index (position in ROOMS array) of the room at the other end of this connection.

skin.description: The Id of the appearance of the fixed (non-shootable) part of this door.

clear_on_use.description: If this door is opened, or if it's entered from the opposite side, should it clear to the blue type?

path_point.description: The Room-unique Path Point Id of this door, referred to by pathing entries.
